messages.welcome:
Welcome to Correlation Center Bot!

{{description}}

Type /help to see all commands.

Use the keyboard below for quick access.
messages.description: The Correlation Center is a system inspired by Jacque Fresco ideas. It ensures that all needs are satisfied using available resources. In short, it's a system to manage needs and resources.
messages.help:
Available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/help - Show this help message
/need - Add a need
/needs - List your needs
/resource - Add a resource
/resources - List your resources
/matching - Manage match notifications
/cancel - Cancel current pending action

messages.promptNeed: Please send the description of your need as your next message.
messages.promptResource: Please send the description of your resource as your next message.
messages.needAdded: Your need was published at {{channel}}. You can manage your needs in private messages of @CorrelationCenterBot.
messages.resourceAdded: Your resource was published at {{channel}}. You can manage your resources in private messages of @CorrelationCenterBot.
messages.needAddedPrivate: Your need was published at {{channel}}. Use the "My needs" button or /needs to view and manage your needs.
messages.resourceAddedPrivate: Your resource was published at {{channel}}. Use the "My resources" button or /resources to view and manage your resources.
messages.matchNotificationNeedToResource: Your need "{{needDescription}}" matches a resource: "{{resourceDescription}}" by {{resourceUser}}
messages.matchNotificationNeedToNeed: Your need "{{needDescription}}" matches another need: "{{matchDescription}}" by {{matchUser}}
messages.matchNotificationResourceToNeed: Your resource "{{resourceDescription}}" matches a need: "{{needDescription}}" by {{needUser}}
messages.matchingEnabled: Match notifications are enabled. You will be notified when your needs/resources match with others.
messages.matchingDisabled: Match notifications are disabled. Use /matching on to enable notifications.
messages.matchingTurnedOn: Match notifications turned ON. You will now receive notifications when matches are found.
messages.matchingTurnedOff: Match notifications turned OFF. You will no longer receive match notifications.
messages.matchingHelp:
Matching commands:
/matching - Check current status
/matching on - Enable notifications
/matching off - Disable notifications

limitResourcesPerDay: You have already posted {{count}} resources in the last 24 hours. Limit is {{limit}} per day (rolling 24h window).
actionCancelled: Your current action has been canceled.
noPendingAction: You have no pending action to cancel.
anonymousNotAllowed: Only personal accounts can create needs or resources.
